resource.chars:
PLAN OF THE ZODIACAL LIGHT, & THE EARTH'S 
ORBIT
SECTIONAL VIEW OF SAME, AS SEEN FROM THE NODES 
OF THE SUN'S EQUATORM & EARTH'S ORBIT. 
SECTIONAL VIEW OF THE ZODIACAL LIGHT, AS SEEN FROM 
A POINT IN THE EARTH'S ORBIT. 90[degree] FROM ITS NODES 
WITH THE SUN'S EQUATOR.
APPEARANCE WHICH SHOULD BE SEEN FROM THE EARTH, 
IF THE ZODIACAL LIGHT WERE IN THE FORM OF A 
RING, INSTEAD OF A LENTICULAR BODY.
